name.en: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.thai: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.ko: A Day in the Life of Serika

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.thai: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.ko: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_tw: 老師和對策委員會學生們跟蹤茜香，來到她打工的拉麵店。大家吃了拉麵度過愉快的時光，可是茜香依然一副沒好氣的樣子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被頭盔團綁架。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.thai: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.ko: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.zh_tw: 老師撞見了茜香，向她親切地問好，並表示想知道她去哪裡、做什麼。茜香躲閃著，但老師步步緊跟；茜香後承認是打工，並要求老師不再跟隨，但老師並沒有聽從。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师撞见了芹香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。芹香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；芹香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

hobby.jp: 貯金、アルバイト

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.thai: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.ko: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
desc.zh_tw: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.

desc.en: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.jp: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.thai: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.ko: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.zh_tw: 老師帶著對策委員會的其它人來到了茜香打工的拉麵店，茜香大為震撼。然後，茜香帶領大家就坐；之後，野乃美主動提出結賬，但老師最終還是用大人的卡片結了賬。吃飽後，大家在茜香的難堪與強烈要求下返回了學校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.thai: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.ko: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_tw: 柴大將是一位在阿拜多斯校區附近經營著一個名叫“柴犬拉麵”的餐廳老闆，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.ko: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.zh_tw: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.en: Serika finally got off work at night, but was ambushed by the Helmet Gang. She was captured alive.
desc.jp: Serika finally got off work at night, but was ambushed by the Helmet Gang. She was captured alive.
desc.thai: Serika finally got off work at night, but was ambushed by the Helmet Gang. She was captured alive.
desc.ko: Serika finally got off work at night, but was ambushed by the Helmet Gang. She was captured alive.
desc.zh_tw: 茜香晚上終於下班，但卻遭到了頭盔團的前後夾擊，茜香被活捉。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 芹香晚上终于下班，但却遭到了头盔团的前后夹击，芹香被活捉。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 茜香晚上终于下班，但却遭到了头盔团的前后夹击，茜香被活捉。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜香晚上终于下班，但却遭到了头盔团的前后夹击，茜香被活捉。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.zh_tw: 抵達黑市的對策委員會一行人遇上三一綜合學園的學生，野乃美。野乃美是為了購買佩洛洛限定玩偶才來到黑市，但卻被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑當中。對策委員會一行人為了阻止那群小流氓，於是便與他們打了起來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日富美。日富美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，野乃美。野乃美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，野乃美。野乃美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.en: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.jp: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.thai: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.ko: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.zh_tw: 擊敗小流氓的野乃美和對策委員會一行人，為了被捲入更大的騷動而離開現場。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败小流氓的日富美和对策委员会一行人，为了被卷入更大的骚动而离开现场。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击败小流氓的野乃美和对策委员会一行人，为了被卷入更大的骚动而离开现场。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击败小流氓的野乃美和对策委员会一行人，为了被卷入更大的骚动而离开现场。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force was amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone met Hifumi, who was being chased by some gangsters at that moment, and saved her for good.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force was amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone met Hifumi, who was being chased by some gangsters at that moment, and saved her for good.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force was amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone met Hifumi, who was being chased by some gangsters at that moment, and saved her for good.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force was amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone met Hifumi, who was being chased by some gangsters at that moment, and saved her for good.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人被黑市的規模之大所震驚。就在這時眾人遇到了被混混追趕的野乃美，順手將其救下。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人被黑市的规模之大所震惊。就在这时众人遇到了被混混追赶的日富美，顺手将其救下。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会一行人被黑市的规模之大所震惊。就在这时众人遇到了被混混追赶的野乃美，顺手将其救下。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会一行人被黑市的规模之大所震惊。就在这时众人遇到了被混混追赶的野乃美，顺手将其救下。

desc.en: Everyone asked why she was being chased, and Hifumi answered that it was because of the limited edition of the Pellolo. It was at this moment that the gangsters were back, and everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Everyone asked why she was being chased, and Hifumi answered that it was because of the limited edition of the Pellolo. It was at this moment that the gangsters were back, and everyone started to engage.
desc.thai: Everyone asked why she was being chased, and Hifumi answered that it was because of the limited edition of the Pellolo. It was at this moment that the gangsters were back, and everyone started to engage.
desc.ko: Everyone asked why she was being chased, and Hifumi answered that it was because of the limited edition of the Pellolo. It was at this moment that the gangsters were back, and everyone started to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人詢問野乃美為何被追，後者回答是為了買佩洛洛大人的限定版周邊。就在這時剛剛被打倒的混混又回來了，眾人開始作戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人询问日富美为何被追，后者回答是为了买佩洛洛大人的限定版周边。就在这时刚刚被打倒的混混又回来了，众人开始作战。
